item.title: Host your VPN
item.description: Host VPN on your own VPS OpenVPN OpenVPN is an open-source commercial software that implements virtual private network (VPN) techniques. DigitalOcean Since we are going to host our own VPN, first we need a server, and DigitalOcean is easy to start with, you can also try AWS or Google Cloud if you want more options. Sign Up for DigitalOcean account. https://m.do.co/c/33207b814f8b if you use this link, you will get $200 for 60 days.
